content.en: Blood pressure algorithms: Researchers have been exploring different algorithms to improve the accuracy and reliability of blood pressure estimation. These algorithms, such as those based on data mining techniques, machine learning, and multi-sensor fusion, aim to provide more accurate and continuous blood pressure monitoring without the need for traditional cuff-based devices. By utilizing various physiological signals and features, these algorithms offer potential advancements in non-invasive blood pressure measurement techniques, paving the way for true wearable applications and improving overall health monitoring.
content.da: Blodtryksalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og pålideligheden af blodtryksestimation. Disse algoritmer, såsom dem baseret på data mining-teknikker, maskinlæring og multi-sensor fusion, sigter mod at give mere nøjagtig og kontinuerlig blodtryksmonitorering uden behovet for traditionelle manchetbaserede enheder. Ved at udnytte forskellige fysiologiske signaler og træk, tilbyder disse algoritmer potentielle fremskridt i ikke-invasive blodtryksmålingsmetoder, hvilket baner vejen for ægte bærbare applikationer og forbedrer den overordnede sundhedsovervågning.
